Name: Shinobi Warfare
About the game: Shinobi Warfare is a 2d RPG Turn Based game which lets you create and customize up to six different shinobis, strengthen them with different set of skills, weapons and more accessories to level up and compete with other players. The game offers different multiplier game modes which allows you to team up and play or compete with others, such as Clan Wars, Offline Arena, Live PVP and more. You can play trough various events and missions to level up and unlock new items, and if you ever feel lonely, you could always recruit friends to the battles!
Meta Title: Shinobi Warfare: Jun 14, 2022, TechnoTal and Full Overview
